channel.title: [508+] My To Do List :)
channel.description:
1. Disable Spawning Of Noted Items / Sell of noted items
2. working Mute & Ip Mute Command.
3. pnpc command
4. what is the code format to make the command to check if u have an amount of cash and then remove it from inventory. ex (&&P.Item >= 100)
5. Do u know where to find a 508 "Vote For Cash" i have looked and searched. also which site should i use for mysql for noobs? also any other helpful info would be great!
6. Good commands to add to a 508 + server? -Fun -Important -shortcut commands -etc
7. How To make it so admins can drop (dw i know its dangerous)
8. where do i modify which player rights can trade? example im owner but p rights is 2 (admin) so i cant trade. i want to add to the trade code so if username = my name i can trade.
9. any one know any dupes that i should fix in codeusa?
10. if you have any other things that i should modify for a 508 + please feel free to shout it out :)
THANKS SO MUCH!
Brandon

item.title: [508+] My To Do List :)

item.description:
@b15 wrote:

  1. Disable Spawning Of Noted Items / Sell of noted items

  2. working Mute & Ip Mute Command.

  3. pnpc command

  4. what is the code format to make the command to check if u have an amount of cash and then remove it from inventory. ex (&&P.Item >= 100)

  5. Do u know where to find a 508 “Vote For Cash” i have looked and searched. also which site should i use for mysql for noobs? also any other helpful info would be great!

  6. Good commands to add to a 508 + server?
    -Fun
    -Important
    -shortcut commands
    -etc

  7. How To make it so admins can drop (dw i know its dangerous)

  8. where do i modify which player rights can trade? example im owner but p rights is 2 (admin) so i cant trade. i want to add to the trade code so if username = my name i can trade.

  9. any one know any dupes that i should fix in codeusa?

  10. if you have any other things that i should modify for a 508 + please feel free to shout it out

THANKS SO MUCH!
